summary: The Agility in Manufacturing Preparedness Act of 2025 aims to enhance collaboration between the Biomedical Advanced Research and Development Authority (BARDA) and the Manufacturing USA institutes. The bill seeks to improve public health and medical preparedness by allowing these entities to work together on biomanufacturing projects and deploying related technologies and response capabilities. It specifically amends the Public Health Service Act to facilitate strategic coordination, including the development, demonstration, and deployment of relevant technologies.
